hints.content:
We need to count how many pictures are over each class on the picture graph.

[[☃ image 1]]

There are $\blueD3$ pictures over tap.

$\blueD3\times \greenD5 = \blueD{15}$

There are $\blueD{15}$ squirrels in tap classes.

options.alt: A picture graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Dance classes and the vertical axis labeled Squirrels. Each dance class is listed along the horizontal axis from the left of the axis to the right of the axis as follows: tap, ballet, jazz, and hip hop. The number of squirrels for each dance class is represented by the number of squirrel pictures plotted on the graph. Tap is represented by 3 squirrel pictures, ballet is represented by 4 squirrel pictures, jazz is represented by 6 squirrel pictures, and hip hop is represented by 5 squirrel pictures. The squirrel pictures for tap dance class are labeled 1, 2, and 3. !

hints.content:
We also need to know how many squirrels are in ballet and hip hop.

[[☃ image 1]]

Dance class| Number of [[☃ image 2]]| Number of squirrels
:- | :-: | :-:
$\blueD{\text{Tap}}$ | $3$ | $3\times\greenD5= \blueD{15}$  
$\purpleD{\text{Ballet}}$ | $4$ | $4\times\greenD5 = \purpleD{20}$
$\goldE{\text {Hip hop}}$ | $5$ | $5\times\greenD5=\goldE{25}$

options.alt: A picture graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Dance classes and the vertical axis labeled Squirrels. Each dance class is listed along the horizontal axis from the left of the axis to the right of the axis as follows: tap, ballet, jazz, and hip hop. The number of squirrels for each dance class is represented by the number of squirrel pictures plotted on the graph. Tap is represented by 3 squirrel pictures, ballet is represented by 4 squirrel pictures, jazz is represented by 6 squirrel pictures, and hip hop is represented by 5 squirrel pictures. The squirrel pictures for tap dance class are labeled 1, 2, and 3. The squirrel pictures for ballet dance class are labeled 1, 2, 3, and 4. The squirrel pictures for hip hop dance class are labeled 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5. !

hints.content:
First, we add to see how many squirrels are in $\blueD{\text{tap}}$ and $\purpleD{\text{ballet}}$ combined.

$\blueD {15} + \purpleD {20} = \maroonD{35}$

Next, we subtract to see how many more $\maroonD{35}$ squirrels is than the number of squirrels in $\goldE{\text{hip hop}}$.

$\maroonD{35} - \goldE{25} = 10$
There are $10$ more squirrels in tap and ballet combined than in hip hop.

question.content:
The picture graph below shows the number of squirrels participating in different dance classes.

[[☃ image 1]]

[[☃ image 2]]

**How many more squirrels are in tap and ballet combined than in hip hop?**   

[[☃ input-number 1]] squirrels

Each dance class is listed along the horizontal axis from the left of the axis to the right of the axis as follows: tap, ballet, jazz, and hip hop. The number of squirrels for each dance class is represented by the number of squirrel pictures plotted on the graph. Tap is represented by 3 squirrel pictures, ballet is represented by 4 squirrel pictures, jazz is represented by 6 squirrel pictures, and hip hop is represented by 5 squirrel pictures. !
